articles.title: Google reveals significant step to restrict cross-app tracking on Android | Advertising - Campaign Asia
articles.description: The company plans to introduce stricter privacy controls including the removal of cross-app identifiers such as its own Advertising ID. The announcement comes just weeks after the impact of Apple's similar move—on Meta in particular—was revealed.
articles.content:
